A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Star Wars is dead to me thanks to this film. What a shame as I have been a fan of the series for about 23 years. I understand that the prequels had their problems but I still enjoyed them for telling unique stories. This however is utterly Unforgivable! The director had Absolutely no respect or understanding of the source material. It's clear to me that both rian johnson and the corporate shill of a company disney have to meet their certain social and political agendas. I'm so Sorry Carrie Fisher\, Mark Hamill & George Lucas.
